abstract: A group of investors argues that an analysis of a company’s pay practices can provide insights into managerial confidence.
snippet: A group of investors argues that an analysis of a company’s pay practices can provide insights into managerial confidence.
lead_paragraph: EXAMINING insider stock transactions has always helped investors gauge managers’ confidence in their own company’s prospects. Shareholders who hear an executive boast of a grand strategic plan while dumping piles of his own stock have a right to be dubious. Actions speak louder than words, after all.

headline.main: Hear Ye, Hear Ye: Corralling Executive Pay
headline.print_headline: Hear Ye, Hear Ye: Corralling Executive Pay
